A '''Spell shear''' was an advanced [[elven]] practice of magic.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|337|19}}
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|261}}, Mythanthor survived an assassination attempt by [[Llombaerth Starym]], in which he was joined by [[Elminster Aumar]], by using a spell shear, which overcame Elminster's ''[[antimagic field]]'', even after it was bolstered with a ''[[lifequench]]'' spell.
